data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Linnaeus (1753): p. 941 - 943. In: Carolus Linnaeus (Ed): Species plantarum: exhibentes plantas rite cognitas ad genera relatas, cum diferentiis specificis, nominibus trivialibus, synonymis selectis, locis natalibus, secundum systema sexuale digestas / Caroli Linnæe. Holmiae: 941-943, DOI: 10.5962/bhl.title.37656
